name: A (Very) Mazey Christmas
description:
A (Very) Mazey Christmas to y'all! 

Santa has crash-landed, and unfortunately, lost his gifts. Help him find them and get back to his sleigh, while avoiding doggos.

Controls

Left-Click or Hold Mouse to Move.

Credits

A Game by

Anuraj Bhatnagar

Cerone B

Jackson Cordes

Logan Bowers

For the Totally Ranked Game Jam. This game was created using Unreal Engine 4.

Platform

PC
